mapper.insert: insert into t_order ( id, order_no, course_id, course_title, course_cover, teacher_name, member_id, nickname, mobile, total_fee, pay_type, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{orderNo}, #{courseId}, #{courseTitle}, #{courseCover}, #{teacherName}, #{memberId}, #{nickname}, #{mobile}, #{totalFee}, #{payType}, #{status}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified} )
